Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green and Loop-bound Pink Line Service Delayed at Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Ashland/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line and Loop-bound Pink Line trains are standing at Ashland/Lake due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #N9 Ashland and #N20 Madison buses.

Also, as a result of the delay, shuttle bus service has been requested as follows:

  • For the Green Line: from Damen/Lake to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service in both directions.
  • For the Pink Line: from Polk to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
